definitions.definition: A mineral substance made up of small crystals of silica and alumina , that is ductile when moist; the material of pre-fired ceramics .
An earth material with ductile qualities.
A tennis court surface made of crushed stone, brick, shale, or other unbound mineral aggregate.
examples: The French Open is played on clay .

definitions.definition: The material of the human body.
A particle less than 3.9 microns in diameter , following the Wentworth scale .
A clay pipe for smoking tobacco.

examples: We went shooting clays at the weekend.

definitions.definition: Land or territory of a country or other political region, especially when subject to territorial claims.

main_definition: A mineral substance made up of small crystals of silica and alumina , that is ductile when moist; the material of pre-fired ceramics .
secondary_definitions: An earth material with ductile qualities.
( tennis ) A tennis court surface made of crushed stone, brick, shale, or other unbound mineral aggregate.

( geology ) A particle less than 3.9 microns in diameter , following the Wentworth scale .
A clay pipe for smoking tobacco.
( Internet slang , humorous ) Land or territory of a country or other political region, especially when subject to territorial claims.
